thread.title: Kate Moss Finally Responds to a Fan Letter From 1994
thread.title_full: Kate Moss Finally Responds to a Fan Letter From 1994

title: Kate Moss Finally Responds to a Fan Letter From 1994
text:
Kate Moss Finally Responds to a Fan Letter From 1994 
"Are you really going out with Johnny Depp?" Most Popular By Kristina Rodulfo Jan 6, 2017 The year is 1994. Kate Moss is the biggest supermodel in the world, landing an iconic Calvin Klein campaign and walking countless runways from Prada to John Galliano. She's just started dating Johnny Depp. And, she's inspiring young girls like Fiona from Hereford, England, who wrote her a fan letter―one that finally got a response 23 years later. "I always wanted to be a model or a hairdresser," Fiona wrote, "I opted for hair and beauty because I love chips and junk food and I am short, so in years to come who know[s]. I might even be doing your hair and make-up fingers crossed." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A real highlight of the fanmail is the doodle of a flower that says "keep smiling" in the corner–oh, and this: "Are you really going out with Johnny Depp? If so, can I have yours and his autographs or photographs please." Moss and Depp in 1994. Getty Most Popular The letter was shared on Instagram by Kate Moss's new namesake talent agency ,which promised to send Fiona a signed copy of The Kate Moss Book . A photo posted by Kate Moss Agency (@katemossagency) on Jan 5, 2017 at 6:07am PST Better late than never?
